inclusion.criterion: vaginal or caesarean delivery and are feeling well
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: first time mothers to avoid confounding variables due to previous positive or negative experiences from expressing milk
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: infant will have been born at less than 32.0 weeks of gestation
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: mothers intend to breastfeed and are planning to pump milk on site in the NICU at least once/day
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: mothers who smoke, are taking medication that may interfere with breastfeeding, and who have undergone prior breast surgery will not be excluded since they are their own control
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: mothers must be able to understand the directions and sign a consent form in English
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: survival as determined by the attending physician
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: mothers who have been diagnosed with mastitis will not be recruited for the study
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient is a healthy woman, works at a rehab center, and has no underlying disease. She intends to breastfeed and pump milk on site in the NICU.
